trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Cambridge
There were no other sightings in Cambridge on or around November 13th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving on the A11 near Cambridge when I looked up and noticed the lights. It was very large. There were 2 sets of lights. The first set on the top of the disc was vertical lines with spaces in between and they made a full oval and were spinning counter clock wise. Underneath those lights were little dots, that seemed like they were turning off and on. At first I thought it was reflections, but we pulled over on the side of the road and it was still moving. Once we got a distance away I could see the full shape.Im not a big believer in Aliens and Ufo's but this made me believe. I wish I wasn't so freaked out or we would have taken a picture.
Summary: Vertical lights circling with small blinking lights on bottom
